attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the announcement by the leader of Islam4UK Anjem Choudary to hold a protest march in Wootton Bassett, we the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ensure that this organisation is banned for inciting hatred, having links with the outlawed organisation Al-Muhajiroun, and creating division within communities.

rejection.details: Islam4UK, along with a number of other extremist groups, has been proscribed by the Home Secretary. I will be illegal to become a member of this group as of Thursday 14 January.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
